item.title: Forward Overboard valve (Lower 41 section) Models Without Auxiliary Fuel Tank Provisions – Deactivated Closed

remarks.para: May be inoperative deactivated closed provided:

numlitem.para: Procedures are established and used to verify aft lower lobe cargo compartment remains empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits,

For Combi, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits, and
If installed, the main cabin exhaust valve(s) is deactivated closed.

note.para: Cabin Exhaust Valve(s) are not installed on UPS aircraft.
UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Aft lower cargo compartment is empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard "FWD OVERBOARD VALVE INOP - CLOSED" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: FORWARD OVERBOARD VALVE (LOWER 41 SECTION) MODELS WITHOUT AUXILIARY FUEL TANK PROVISIONS

numlitem.para: Deactivate the forward overboard valve in the closed position. Valve is located on the inside of the fuselage to the left of the nose gear wheel well.
Open and collar the P6 panel FWD OVBD VLV CONT and the P180 panel FWD OVBD VALVE POWER circuit breakers.
Disconnect, cap, and stow electrical connector DV462 from valve.
Manually position the operating lever/position indicator to the closed position.

note.para: The manual operating lever may be lockwired to the actuator mounting screws.
